ALK.MI.summary: Alkemy S.p.A. operates in the digital transformation market in Italy and internationally. The company offers consulting and performance marketing services that manages planning and procurement activities for its customers on the digital media, search engines, and social media platforms; and designs, develops, and operates technologies for B2B and B2C channels, front-end solutions, CRM, CMS, portals, apps, etc. It also provides data and analytics services, as well as brand experience services for preparing and structuring brand strategies and creativity, advertising campaigns, products or services for commercial businesses, and communication with consumers. In addition, the company offers product and space design services. Alkemy S.p.A. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

AMM.MI.summary: AMM S.p.a. provides Web marketing services for Italian companies to communicate with its customers. It offers services for sending professional SMS and multichannel messages, chatbots, new algorithms of artificial intelligence, and automation. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Arezzo, Italy.

CAI.MI.summary: Cairo Communication S.p.A. operates as a multimedia publishing company in Italy and Spain. The company operates in six segments: Magazine Publishing Cairo Editore, RCS, Advertising, TV Publishing (La7), Network Operator (Cairo Network), and Il Trovatore. The Magazine Publishing Cairo Editore segment publishes magazines and books, including weeklies, supplements, and monthlies. The RCS segment is involved in publishing newspapers and magazines; print media and online advertising sales; the distribution of editorial products at newsstands; and pay and Web TV, and sports radio activities. It also organizes sporting events. The Advertising segment sells advertising space on print media, TV, Internet, and stadiums. The TV Publishing (La7) segment operates as a TV publisher on digital terrestrial platforms. The Network Operator (Cairo Network) segment provides network operation services. The II Trovatore segment publishes electronic content. The company is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

CI1A.F.summary: Cairo Communication S.p.A. operates as a multimedia publishing company in Italy and Spain. The company operates in six segments: Magazine Publishing Cairo Editore, RCS, Advertising, TV Publishing (La7), Network Operator (Cairo Network), and Il Trovatore. The Magazine Publishing Cairo Editore segment publishes magazines and books, including weeklies, supplements, and monthlies. The RCS segment is involved in publishing newspapers and magazines; print media and online advertising sales; the distribution of editorial products at newsstands; and pay and Web TV, and sports radio activities. It also organizes sporting events. The Advertising segment sells advertising space on print media, TV, Internet, and stadiums. The TV Publishing (La7) segment operates as a TV publisher on digital terrestrial platforms. The Network Operator (Cairo Network) segment provides network operation services. The II Trovatore segment publishes electronic content. The company is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

DGT.MI.summary: DigiTouch S.p.A. provides digital marketing and transformation services in Italy and internationally. The company offers digital strategic consulting services for digital transformation; performance marketing and lead generation campaigns; and amplification services, such as consultancy and online brand reputation management. It serves medium and big companies in the retail/e-commerce, insurance/finance, fashion, and pharma markets. DigiTouch S.p.A. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

DIG.MI.summary: Digital360 S.p.A. operates multi-channel B2B platform in Italy. The company offers digital marketing and sales engine, content management system, customer relationship management, marketing automation, and smart recommendation project services. It also operates DIGITAL360Hub, a portal for digital solution providers; BankingUp, an online portal for finance and Fintech companies; RetailUp, an online portal for retailing and distribution sectors; AutomotiveUp, an online portal for automotive sector; and SmartMobilityUp, an online portal for mobility market, as well as ZeroUno, ForumPA, ScegliFornitore, and CorCom portals. In addition, it provides advisory and coaching services in the areas of audit and compliance, IT governance and cyber security, people strategy and digital open innovation, legal, healthcare, MarTech, sports, and operations. Further, the company operates micro-learning platforms, such as 360 Digital School and FPA Digital School. It serves managers, professionals, policy makers, politicians, tech companies, startups, and public administrations. Digital360 S.p.A. is based in Milan, Italy.

DMMN.F.summary: Netweek S.p.A. engages in the drafting, production, distribution, and sale of local information. The company operates iNetweek, which is a local media circuit with 68 local newspapers in northern Italy, as well as offers an online edition of newspapers. It also provides contract outsourcing services; multi-channel integrated communication services on various media and channels for small and medium-sized businesses; and print and digital advertising services. The company was formerly known as Dmail Group S.p.A. Netweek S.p.A. was founded in 1979 and is based in Merate, Italy. Netweek S.p.A. operates as a subsidiary of D.Holding S.r.l.

FUL.MI.summary: FullSix S.p.A. provides digital transformation, data driven marketing, and communication services in Italy and internationally. It also operates Orchestra, an Internet of Things platform. In addition, the company engages in the online video and TV production activities; and designing, planning, and approving networks and mobile terminals. FullSix S.p.A. was founded in 1988 and is based in Milan, Italy. FullSix S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Orizzonti Holding S.p.A.

IA6.F.summary: FullSix S.p.A. provides digital transformation, data driven marketing, and communication services in Italy and internationally. It also operates Orchestra, an Internet of Things platform. In addition, the company engages in the online video and TV production activities; and designing, planning, and approving networks and mobile terminals. FullSix S.p.A. was founded in 1988 and is based in Milan, Italy. FullSix S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Orizzonti Holding S.p.A.

IEG.MI.summary: Italian Exhibition Group S.p.A. manages and organizes exhibitions worldwide. The company organizes trade fairs, events, and conferences. It also provides services related trade fairs and conferences, as well as engages in the promotion and management of conferences, conventions, exhibitions, cultural events, and shows and leisure activities. The company organizes and implements organized events for food and beverage; jewelry and fashion; tourism, hospitality and lifestyle; wellness, sport, and leisure; and green and technology sectors. The company is based in Rimini, Italy.

NTW.MI.summary: Netweek S.p.A. engages in the drafting, production, distribution, and sale of local information. The company operates iNetweek, which is a local media circuit with 68 local newspapers in northern Italy, as well as offers an online edition of newspapers. It also provides contract outsourcing services; multi-channel integrated communication services on various media and channels for small and medium-sized businesses; and print and digital advertising services. The company was formerly known as Dmail Group S.p.A. Netweek S.p.A. was founded in 1979 and is based in Merate, Italy. Netweek S.p.A. operates as a subsidiary of D.Holding S.r.l.

TB.MI.summary: Triboo S.p.A. provides e-commerce and digital advertising services worldwide. It offers digital consulting, marketing, and integration and development services; and e-commerce management, content development, audience and monetization, and training services. The company is based in Milan, Italy. Triboo S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Compagnia Digitale Italiana Spa.

WEB.MI.summary: Websolute S.p.A. operates as a digital company in Italy. The company creates digital PR and social engagement experiences that connects to people; develops e-commerce projects on the Magento platform; and designs and implements solutions in virtual and augmented reality. It also provides performance marketing agency services; video storytelling and advertising services; e-business consulting and management services in outsourcing of online stores; and platform mobile development services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Pesaro, Italy.
